pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, October 26, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Premier of British Columbia, John Horgan.

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of South Korea, Moon Jae-in.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and participate in a virtual fireside chat during the Canadian Chamber of Commerce’s Annual General Meeting and Convention.

Journalists wishing to livestream the event should contact ptaylor@chamber.ca for registration.

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a discussion with Ambassador of Canada to the United States Kirsten Hillman and Canadian consuls general in the United States.

Closed to media.

Media appearances

8:30 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on 99.9 The Bay.

12:20 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CIFM Îles de la Madeleine.
